```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidytext)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data<- read_csv("new.csv")
```
```{r}
get_sentiments("afinn")

afinn <- data %>% 
  rownames_to_column() %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("afinn"), by = c("one" = "word")) %>% 
  group_by(index = as.numeric(rowname) %/%1000) %>% 
  summarise(sentiment = sum(score))
```

```{r}
ggplot(afinn, aes(index, sentiment, fill = method)) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE)
```
